value.title: DAX Fridays! #167: Calculate previous row using DAX
value.excerpt: You have been asking me, how do I calculate previous row in Power  BI using DAX so I can get new cases on the corona dataset? , and this is exactly what we are going to do in this video. value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
